example.eg: The student followed the teacher's instructions exactly and got all the answers right.
example.egtrans: 学生们一丝不苟地遵守老师的指导，所有的回答都正确。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 确切地，精确地, 一丝不苟地

example.eg: Jim wasn't sure if he was doing the task correctly, but his boss told him what he was doing was exactly right.
example.egtrans: 吉姆不知道自己任务做的是不是正确，但老板告诉他，他做得完全没错。

example.eg: "Do you mean this is our new house?" "Exactly!"
example.egtrans: “你是说，这就是我们的新房子？”“没错！”

trans_examp.trans_cn: 正是, 确实如此, 没错
